code: import api from'./api';class DatingService{async getProfile(){const response=await api.get('/dating/profile');return response.data;}async updateProfile(profile){const response=await api.patch('/dating/profile',profile);return response.data;}async getPotentialMatches(){const response=await api.get('/dating/potential-matches');return response.data;}async likeProfile(profileId){await api.post(`/dating/like/${profileId}`);}async dislikeProfile(profileId){await api.post(`/dating/dislike/${profileId}`);}async getMatches(){const response=await api.get('/dating/matches');return response.data;}async acceptMatch(matchId){await api.post(`/dating/matches/${matchId}/accept`);}async rejectMatch(matchId){await api.post(`/dating/matches/${matchId}/reject`);}}export const datingService=new DatingService();export default datingService;
